metadata.subject: Representative government and representation
metadata.title: Discours que M. Savoye de Rollin, avocat général & président du cinquime [sic] district, a prononcé avant le serment des officiers municipaux, dans l'église cathédrale de Grenoble : et celui de M. le maire à la maison commune.
metadata.creator: Savoye-Rollin, Jacques-Fortunat, 1754-1823.
Savoye-Rollin, Jacques-Fortunat, 1754-1823
Montferrat, Joseph-Marie de Barral, marquis de, 1742-1828
metadata.description: The mayor of Grenoble was Joseph-Marie de Barral from February 28 until August 1; Laurent de Franquières, Antoine Barnave, and Daniel d'Isoard were also mayor in 1790
Not in Martin & Walter. Révolution française
"Discours de M. Royer, aîné, commissaire des Etats de la province du Dauphiné, prononcé dans l'assemblée du quatrieme district, dont il étoit président"--P. 7-8
metadata.notes: Title page located on front cover. No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Worn, damaged and discolored pages and cover. Skewed text. Uneven binding.
